data.title: Alaska History and Cultural Studies
data.text:
Alaska History and Cultural Studies offers an online curriculum designed to teach Alaskan high school students about their state, its rich history and its people. The Alaska Humanities Forum and the stateâ€™s leading historians, anthropologists, geographers and educators developed the course.

Teachers can work from the Teacher Guide (assessment are included) and use the Student section as the online textbook. Only teachers can log in to access the assessments, and are asked to include name, class and school when requesting materials. meilleur casino en ligne

Contact us for more information, to request access to the Teacher Guide online assessments or the Teacher Guide hardcopy (limited supplies).

So we can better direct you to appropriate content, please begin by choosing an option below:
